papers.title: Operations Experience of SNS at 1.4MW and Upgrade Plans for Doubling the Beam Power
authors: the SNS begins operation at the design proton beam power of 1.4 MW. This talk will present the critical technical challenges that were overcome in order to take the final step in beam power with a higher than 90% reliability. In addition
the future project of the SNS for doubling the beam power from 1.4 MW to 2.8 MW and construction of second target station will be discussed.
